headline: Eastman Chemical (EMN) Reports Q2 Earnings: What Key Metrics Have to Say
summary: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for Eastman Chemical (EMN) give a sense of how the business performed in the quarter ended June 2025, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.

headline: Eastman Chemical forecasts downbeat quarterly profit, to reduce inventory as tariffs bite
summary: The industry is also bracing itself for the impact of U.S. President Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs on most imports, which have forced companies to contend with higher raw material costs and weakening demand.  Eastman Chemical makes a wide range of chemicals used in manufacturing end-products across the construction, agricultural and automotive sectors.  The impacts of the trade dispute and seasonality would result in a decline in volumes in the second half of the year, the company said, adding that it plans to reduce inventory by more than $200 million below current levels.

headline: Eastman Chemical (EMN) Lags Q2 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Eastman Chemical (EMN) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -6.98% and -0.13%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Eastman Chemical: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: KINGSPORT, Tenn. AP) — Eastman Chemical Co. (EMN) on Thursday reported second-quarter earnings of $140 million. On a per-share basis, the Kingsport, Tennessee-based company said it had net income of $1.20.

headline: Potassium Formate Company Evaluation Report 2025 | SLB, Eastman Chemical, and Perstorp Lead the Market with Global Reach, Chemical Expertise, and Sustainability-Driven Innovation
summary: This comprehensive analysis of the Potassium Formate Companies Quadrant delves into the global market for potassium formate, highlighting the top 10 businesses that lead the industry.
